definition: gardenia/cape jasmine (Gardenia jasminoides)/same as 栀子
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effect of Jinzhi Hanshuye on severe periodontitis.
sentences.chinese: 觀察金梔含漱液對重度牙周炎的治療效果。

sentences.english: Aim To study the bacterial endotoxin test of yinzhihuang injection using limulus lysate agent.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立茵梔黃注射液的細菌內毒素檢查法。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To establish a method for determining the fingerprints of Yinzhihuang Injection by HPLC.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立評價茵梔黃注射液質量的指紋圖譜分析方法。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the clinical effect of Zhengchangsheng and Yinzhihuang injection in interfering on neonatal jaundice.
sentences.chinese: 目的評價整腸生和茵梔黃干預新生兒黃疸的臨牀治療。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the aspect of pharmacodynamics and clinical evaluation on Yinzhihuang Injection.
sentences.chinese: 目的闡述茵梔黃注射液的藥理作用與臨牀應用評價。

definition: operculum (Latin: little lid)/a covering flap (in various branches of anatomy)
milliwatt (old)/single-character equivalent of 毫瓦[hao2 wa3]
amaranth (genus Amaranthus)/Joseph's coat (Amaranthus tricolor)/Chinese spinach (Amaranth mangostanus)
